response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $15,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $12,000. This price not only ensures a fair transaction but also allows us to maintain a competitive edge in the market. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can work together to achieve mutual success.", "product_price": 12000}
